text: I haven't played this game, I actually recently discovered it. From a review I watched, the game seems like a very fun "driving around a city" game with Crazy Taxi vibes, mostly based on timed missions. The variety and controls of the vehicles look impressive. The Dreamcast may not have lasted long, but it sure had some gems.
author: SupraDarky

text: I used to play this game for hours. Even though each mission had a timer, when the time ran out you could just carry on driving around destroying things. Of course, if you try to complete the mission after the time runs out, you'd get a mission failed.
author: farhadinho9

text: The Car from this game it's a Dino Ferrari 206/246 GT from 1966... In Japan they love a lot that Little Ferrari; the same engine V6 DOHC was mounted Also in a another car Who a lot of gamers know well, the Lancia Stratos.

author: Hamza Ansari

text: I actually own this game it it's crazy fun, if a little short.  But there are a lot of secrets and unlockables to find.  And it's even better if you have a VMU with it, as you can rename many of the townspeople, which will appear in the game.
author: BygPhattyPlus
